cmdlets.name: padl
cmdlets.description: pass through the value with <> and single and double quotes left as is
cmdlets.result: the value with <> and single and double quotes left as is

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: how much padding to apply. defaults to configuration.padl_count

parameters.name: char
parameters.description: character to pad with. defaults to configuration.padl_char

cmdlets.ruby:
value = '' if value.nil?
          # count = Handlebars::Helpers.configuration.padl_count if count.nil?
          count = 30 if count.nil?
          count = count.to_i if count.is_a?(String)
          # char = Handlebars::Helpers.configuration.padl_char if char.nil?
          char = ' ' if char.nil?
          value.to_s.rjust(count, char)
